title: Wolf Tooth Components 8-Bit System Expands with Magnetic Stacking Multi-Tool & Mini Utility Knife!
content:
Move over Swiss Army Knives, there’s a new all-in-one tool in town. And unlike many feature-packed multi-tools, the new 8-Bit Multi-Tool System from Wolf Tooth Components breaks apart to make it easier to use, regardless of the repair. Designed as an addition to their existing 8-Bit Tool, what’s fascinating about the new tool system is that

author: Zach Overholt
